ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Kaesora trouble
ygData.msgSnippet: ... What server? Unless it s Povar I won t have a character high level enough to help, unless there is some possible use for a level 1 Iksar, in which case I
ygData.messageBody:
> Last night we (my bard and his guild) were on a guild raid of Kaesora.
> Things were going great, when my ISP decided it was time to crash.
>
> So now I am camped in the middle of a dangerous room with no chance of
> running out. My guild is unlikely to be able to muster up
> enough force to
> get there anytime soon (we are small, we needed outside help
> getting this
> far). So what can i do? Any ideas?


What server? Unless it's Povar I won't have a character high level enough to
help, unless there is some possible use for a level 1 Iksar, in which case I
would be happy to show up and help. :)

Tszaaz


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
